short_description: This small puzzle game is derived from the board game Richochet Robots.
description:
This small puzzle game is derived from the board game Richochet Robots.

The concept is simple: You are moving figurines across a board trying to place them on targets. The problem is, they don't stop moving when you want them to. They only stop moving if they hit a wall or another figurine. Only then can you control them again.
